data.eml:eml: Description of an unusual new Costa Rican species of Cerodontha (Dizygomyza) with additional notes on Neotropical species of Dizygomyza (Diptera: Agromyzidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Boucher, Stéphanie (2005): Description of an unusual new Costa Rican species of Cerodontha (Dizygomyza) with additional notes on Neotropical species of Dizygomyza (Diptera: Agromyzidae). Zootaxa 993: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171388
